name: synchronize

effect.diamond-pearl: Cannot influence the natures of Pokémon encountered by interacting with them on the overworld.
effect.platinum: Cannot influence the natures of Pokémon encountered by interacting with them on the overworld.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Cannot influence the natures of Pokémon encountered by interacting with them on the overworld.

short_effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
